thread.title: my room keeps dissapearing!!!

comments.text: i dont know why, i dont know how, but every time we teleport to a certain part of my room it just dissapears?!
like the whole thing just poofs, i tried destrying and replacing them but it still is broken
fixed for now, apparently i just had to turn on force to stay loaded from far away!

thread.latestCommentText: fixed for now, apparently i just had to turn on force to stay loaded from far away!
